thread.title: Cornered boxer takes on angry mob
thread.title_full: Cornered boxer takes on angry mob

title: Cornered boxer takes on angry mob
text:
AUSSIES are unknowingly heading into the danger zone when venturing onto these roads. Some of them, hire car companies actually ban you from. Travel Updates Irish boxer fights off Turkish shopkeepers who attack him for accidentally dropping water bottles by: An Irish tourist fights off Turkish shopkeepers after they attack him for dropping water. Courtesy: Youtube/News Time News Corp Australia 27 Aug 2015 News Mob attack ... an Irish tourist was forced to fight off Turkish shopkeepers. Picture: YouTube Source: Supplied THEY picked on the wrong guy. When a mob of shopkeepers in Turkey turned on an Irish tourist, they didn’t realise he was a professional boxer. Incredible video shows the tourist lashing out at more than a dozen shopkeepers who attacked him with sticks and chairs. But not only did the holiday-maker manage to duck their blows, he was able to land a few of his own. Irish boxer fights off Turkish shopkeepers
(Frame content direct link: https://www.youtube.com/embed/jbRIZYi8OmQ.)
The trouble started in Istanbul’s Aksaray district when the Irishman, identified as Kuwaiti-born Mohammed Fadel Dobbous, opened a shop fridge and bottles of water spilt out into the street. The shopkeeper appeared to take offence and launched at the tourist, before calling on other store owners for help, according to Today’s Zaman. Trigger ... the shopkeepers turned on the tourist when he opened a fridge and bottled water fell out. Picture: YouTube Source: Supplied But unfortunately for them, the Irish tourist was a trained boxer and had no trouble defending himself. After taking a punch to the face, one attacker could barely walk. Brawl ... a mob of shopkeepers attacked Irish boxer fights off Turkish shopkeepers. Pic: YouTube Source: Supplied Vicious ... a mob of shopkeepers beat the tourist with sticks. Picture: YouTube Source: Supplied The shopkeepers eventually retreated when the tourist continued to plunge into the crowd. Attack ... the Irish tourist charged at his attackers. Picture: YouTube Source: Supplied ##
